name: Name
signoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
slogan: Web app for people who love tennis!
title: Tennisnow.net

events.title: Organize events
events.body1: Manage a list of events. Manage the number of players, and optionally even the player names. When you're ready to play, you can also randomize player matches.
events.body2: You can set who won each match, and later see which player has the most victories.

signin.title: When you sign in ...
signin.body: You will be able to take advantage of all these features! Follow @tennisnownet on Twitter to keep in touch with new features and updates!
